item.title: Postgres Partial Indexes
item.description: I have a large Postgres database that backs some data services used by a few other apps. This database is not large by Postgres standards, having about 600M rows. I did some reading on Postgres indexes and decided that a series of partial indexes would likely provide the best performance for our variety of queries. However, I was confused that while my analysis revealed that the indexes I created would serve those queries well, Postgres never seemed to use them.
